Texts.Eng: Bring the ^green;Sprouting Table^reset; to me at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;
Try tossing some seeds in there, and wait a bit. You'll soon get some ^orange;Genes^reset; that you can stockpile to create ^green;new types of plants^reset; in the ^orange;Greenhouse.^reset;

^orange;Sprouting Tables^reset; and ^orange;Xeno Labs^reset; are useful devices that extract ^orange;Genes^reset; from plant seeds. You will most certainly require them, so ^orange;go ahead and make a ^orange;Sprouting Table^reset; now^reset;.
